Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) provide electrical energy through a highly efficient direct transformation of chemical energy stored in fuels.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The sealing between the stacked components of the SOFC has to prevent gas leakage towards the environment as well as mixing of fuel gas and oxidant in order to ensure a reliable long-term operability.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Hence, the understanding of the sealing loading conditions and the failure assessment plays a major role regarding the improvement of current and future SOFC designs.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: In the present study, glass ceramics sealing failure is investigated by means of a current SOFC design.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: For this purpose, the stresses in the sealings are firstly examined by employing a fully parameterized three-dimensional finite element model.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: On the basis of a canonical example, the underlying physical mechanisms, which are responsible for the occurrence of stresses, are identified and their influence is discussed.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Since the initiation of sealing failure is complex and depends on several parameters, a methodology for failure assessment is proposed.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: In this context, the glass transition temperature is of superordinate importance.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Since the material properties differ significantly depending on whether the operating temperature is below or above the glass transition temperature, several competing failure mechanisms must be considered.
Titulo: A methodological contribution to failure prediction of glass ceramics sealings in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell stacks
